import {Link, withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import Cookies from 'js-cookie' import {FiShoppingCart} from 'react-icons/fi' import CartContext from '../../context/CartContext' import './index.css' const Header = () => { return( {value => { const {cartList} = value const cartItemsCount = cartList.length const onClickLogout = () => { Cookies.remove('jwt_token') const {history} = props history.replace('/login') } return (
UNI Resto Cafe
Cart
{cartItemsCount}

My Orders

) }} ) } export default withRouter(Header)
